Type.Name: Layer

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Layer extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Describes the layer of a component
Docs.remarks: These enumerated "layer values" are used when determining which UI rendering layer a component is drawn into, which can help in making determinations of when components occlude one another.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.Layer Background = int32(1)

Docs.summary: This layer is reserved for the desktop background

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.Layer Canvas = int32(2)

Docs.summary: This layer is used for Canvas components

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.Layer Invalid = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The object does not have a layer

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.Layer Mdi = int32(4)

Docs.summary: This layer is used for layered components

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.Layer Overlay = int32(6)

Docs.summary: This layer is reserved for future use.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.Layer Popup = int32(5)

Docs.summary: This layer is used for popup components, such as menus

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.Layer Widget = int32(3)

Docs.summary: This layer is normally used for components

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.Layer Window = int32(7)

Docs.summary: This layer is used for toplevel windows.
